// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper[24] = {
	18, 2,
	13, 2,
	8, 4,
	4, 8,
	2, 13,
	2, 20,
	7, 25,
	16, 25,
	23, 21,
	26, 16,
	25, 9,
	22, 3
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper[24] = {
	0.285714f, 0.035088f,
	0.206349f, 0.035088f,
	0.126984f, 0.070175f,
	0.063492f, 0.140351f,
